referral-confirmation.welcomeToVinovest: Welcome to Vinovest. Thanks to your friend, you have been given three months of waived fees on Vinovest!

welcomeToVinovest: Welcome to Vinovest. Thanks to your friend, you have been given three months of waived fees on Vinovest!

slider.title: Trusted by 130,000+ Registered Clients
slider.slide1-text: Vinovest has been absolutely fantastic. They have essentially created a new asset class with relatively low barriers to entry. Great, great way to invest for the long term and diversify my portfolio.
slider.slide2-text-third: investing with Vinovest in the past month. So far I'm very happy with the purchases that have been made for me. The staff has also been great in communicating. They just offered me a fantastic opportunitiy to invest in a case of very popular wine that I know will perform great!
slider.slide3-text: Fine wine has a pretty solid track record when it comes to returns and it’s attractive because it has no correlation with the stock market.
slider.slide4-text: Vinovest gives you a chance to protect yourself from rising inflation by investing in one of the highest appreciating assets.
slider.slide5-text: Probably the simplest and from what i’ve been able to find the best way to get exposure to wine investment. Really happy to have this and looking forward to their whiskey oriented one. Neat to learn from as well since i knew basically nothing around wine.
slider.slide6-text: I love Vinovest. Made investing in wine so easy
slider.slide7-text: Buying expensive wines may be one of your favorite activities, but did you know it could make you money? As a tangible asset, wine has a low correlation with global equities and has less long-term market volatility than other investments.
slider.slide8-text: My experience with Vinovest has been amazing. Very soon after I visited the page for the first time, I got contacted and was offered a personal Zoom meeting to explain wine investing and the Vinovest platform. The process to open an account, get it funded and start investing was very easy. Recommend.
